detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- Token.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreB.sol#10)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreB.sol#74-76)
	- Token.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreB.sol#14)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreB.sol#49-60)
	- Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreB.sol#20)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreB.sol#78-82)
	- Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreB.sol#33)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- Token.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreB.sol#38)
	- StandardToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreB.sol#84-86)

fallback() should be declared external:
	- CoreB.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreB.sol#97-100)
